job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: brbrTikTok is the leading destination for shortform mobile video Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles New York London Paris Berlin Dubai Mumbai Singapore Jakarta Seoul and Tokyo  brbr    brbrTikToks immersive experience global presence and high engagement makes it the ideal destination for brands big and small to showcase their unique identity connect with their consumers and build strong lasting relationships over time brbrOur Brand Ads team focuses on enabling brands to grow and succeed on TikTok by creating cuttingedge monetization products that empowers users creators and advertisers brbrThe Brand Ads Team builds technologies that unlock business growth potential brbrThis team owns several ads products reservation ads auction ads and innovative content ads that enables advertisers and users to foster more awareness of their brand to attain their business goals brbrWe work on the endtoend ads delivery tech stack including ads bidding ranking and forecasting   brbrWe are looking for seasoned engineers that have strong problem solving skills and algorithm understanding to build and manage systems with high performance scalability and availability brbrYou will have the opportunity to partner closely with a globalized engineering and product teams in a highimpact and fastpaced environment   brbr     brbr Create innovative monetization products that drive engagement and business outcomes brbr Develop highly scalable services that powers new ad products for billions of requests Design systems that will optimize monetization efficiency with product engineering and stateoftheart machine learning technologies brbr Implement new ad solutions that will continuously protect the user experiences on TikTok brbr Collaborate with strategy team product managers and other key stakeholders to define products and drive initiatives from engineering perspective brbr Contribute to the success of a rapidly growing and evolving organization with speediness and qualitybrbr    brbr BS degree in Computer Science Computer Engineering or other relevant majors with 3 year of work experience brbr Excellent programming debugging and optimization skills in one or more general purpose programming languages including but not limited to    brbr Ability to think critically and to formulate solutions to problems in a clear and concise way  brbr       brbr                   brbr Good knowledge in one of the following areas machine learning deep learning backend largescale systems data pipeline brbr Good product sense and experience designing and implementing product features  brbrTikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills experiences and unique perspectives Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace brbrAt TikTok our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy To achieve that goal we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach brbrWe believe individuals shouldnt be disadvantaged because of their background or identity but instead should be considered based on their strengths and experience We are passionate about this and hope you are too
